title: nAtha narsvarUpA (sj)
sahitya:
nAtha narsvarUpA naya gItadarp-peru mA nittya 
kartanun nannaDi pOTrinEn nittiya ninnaruL tA


1:  sannidhi vandunai paNindEn santatam anbuDan kanindEn sonda 
magavena vandiruind-ennuDan cintai kaLittiDa vA enrenrum uLLavA
 caraNam 2    nidhiyuDan nirainda nittiyanAi gati taru uyar asrguruvAi nigarillA nirkkum 
pa pA ma ni dha nI pa dha ni sA nidamum karuNai puriyum unnata sarvEshA
 caraNam 3    sattiya vEdanuttamar paNiyum sattiya nAthan sahamuda nI cattira maddiyil
cittira pullaNaiyil manu puttiranenru vandAi aruvE tiruvE guruvE
 caraNam 4    panniru nanmaNiyin oLi minniDum unnata ponna koluvil nanadiyin inniru
pakkamum ninriDumA narkkani enrum pusikkavumE varam taruvAi enrum tudippEn nAtha 
narsorUpA naya gItatavu permA nittiya karttanum nannaDi pOTrinEn nittiya ninnaruL tA
